title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 12
description: A Lunar Interlude. The Pine Guard and the residents of Amnesty Lodge take a well-earned break at a local winter recreation hotspot. Aubrey meets the Hornets. Duck reveals soupy secrets. Ned logs onto the InterNed.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
